title: The Dragstrip Masters of Bahrain -- /DRIVE on NBC Sports Preview
description:
Mike Spinelli talks to Ebrahim Kanoo of Ekanoo Racing on Bahrain's drag-racing culture.

More on Ekanoo Racing here:
http://www.ekanooracing.com/

Chris Harris interviews Porsche driver Nico Hulkenberg on the Porsche 919 LMP1 car and the differences between Formula One and Le Mans. On location at the Bahrain International Circuit.

Watch /DRIVE on NBC: Middle East. 
Friday April 17: 12:30pm EDT (after Bahrain GP free practice 2)
Saturday April 18, 4:00pm EDT (after Bahrain GP qualifying)
Sunday April 19, 2:00pm EDT (after Bahrain GP)

Check your local cable listings for NBC Sports Network (NBCSN).m
